name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years in the software development lifecycle, proficient in scripting, debugging, and continuous integration. Adept at utilizing **C**, **C++**, and various source control systems to deliver robust solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills complemented by a customer-oriented approach.

Full Stack Developer skilled in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, with hands-on expertise in frontend and backend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven ability to build AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and automation. 

Expert in deploying **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Fluent in German and English.

experience.responsibilities:
• Executed **Software Development Lifecycle** (SDLC) processes to lead the design and development of applications in **C**, **C++**, and Assembler, ensuring effective debugging and troubleshooting protocols.
• Engaged in **Continuous Integration** practices utilizing modern CI tools to streamline software builds and deployments, enhancing efficiency and reducing cycle times.
• Produced comprehensive **Technical Documentation** to support application maintenance and facilitate knowledge transfer between cross-functional teams.
• Applied outstanding **Problem Solving** and **Analytical Skills** to identify, diagnose, and resolve software defects, improving overall system reliability by **30%**.
• Collaborated with project teams to adapt and implement best practices in **Source Control**, enhancing team productivity by maintaining organized code repositories and version control with tools like Git.
• Delivered high-quality software solutions with a **Customer Orientation** mindset, gathering user feedback to refine application features and improve user experiences.
• Utilized effective communication in both **German** and **English** to engage with diverse stakeholders, ensuring clarity and alignment on project requirements.
• Mentored junior engineers in **Scripting** techniques and **Debugging** methodologies, fostering a culture of continuous learning within the team.
• Developed automated testing frameworks to improve code quality and reliability, ensuring all software met industry standards before deployment.

- Demonstrated strong **problem-solving** skills by modernizing core financial platforms, migrating to **microservices architecture** using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to enhance scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
- Implemented **analytical skills** through the development of interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
- Enhanced **customer orientation** by delivering real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, improving decision-making metrics by **30%**.
- Utilized **technical documentation** and **source control** strategies to design and deploy a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
- Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating **batch** and **real-time processing** for over **500,000** transactions daily.
- Applied **software development lifecycle** principles to build and deploy machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns with a **25%** reduction in false positives.
- Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, enhancing predictive analytics capabilities by **40%**.

Demonstrated strong **problem-solving** skills by designing and optimizing backend services for diverse applications, ensuring efficient and reliable performance.
Utilized **C** and **C++** for core software development, ensuring robust integration with existing systems while adhering to the **Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)** methodologies.
Employing advanced **scripting** techniques to automate processes and enhance operational efficiency, significantly reducing time spent on repetitive tasks by **30%**.
Conducted comprehensive **debugging** to diagnose and resolve software issues promptly, maintaining system uptime and improving user satisfaction.
Collaborated using **source control** tools to maintain code integrity and facilitate seamless team coordination.
Implemented **Continuous Integration (CI)** practices to ensure quality and regular iteration of software delivery, decreasing deployment time by **25%**.
Produced thorough **technical documentation** that streamlined onboarding for new team members, contributing to overall team efficiency.
Exhibited strong **analytical skills** to troubleshoot complex issues, leading to improved application functionality and performance metrics.
Maintained a customer-centric focus by aligning development with user needs, achieving a **15%** increase in user engagement and satisfaction.
Demonstrated **service orientation** in addressing customer feedback and iterating product features with a focus on usability, leading to positive customer reviews in both **German** and **English**.
